name: Vintage Van Halen
description: There's only one way to rock!  Vintage Van Halen celebrates 40x awesome riffs shred by Eddie Van Halen. Built for the Sega MegaDrive using the Sega Genesis Development Kit [SGDK].  Available for FREE but suggested donation is $1.00 either directly or paypal.me/SteveProXNA.  Alternatively, feel free to buy me a coffee @ ko-fi.com/SteveProXNA.  Thanks!
